content:
Prev: Ground Hornbill Up: Joshua Tree and Living Desert Museum Next: Swift Fox

Mountain Lion



This one was very close to us, on the other side of a glass wall. Once all the people moved on to other exhibits, it got bored and moved away too.
Taken Sunday, March 16, 2003, 04:32:00pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 5.9Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/10s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 73mm (117mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 6800:30, 1:12:25:40:10:25:15+M, Curve 0:0 - 20:12 - 60:55 - 85:80 - 130:130 - 255:255, USM 15:15 - 40:2
